short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 自动申请联盟广告插件

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help you to apply awin advertisements automatically

Awin Helper is extension for helping you apply for awin advertisements automatically. You just need to setup your content in panel, then login in awin.com and start this extension. It will apply all the 'Not Joined' advertisements automatically with the content you have set.

Here's how to use this extension:

1. Go to the panel from the extension. And register an account.
2. Setup the offer content in the panel.
3. Go to 'https://www.awin.com', and login in with your own account.
4. Click 'Not Joined' tab, and click 'start' in this extension.
5. Enjoy.
